tier1_labs.text:
Introducing the Codex appâ€”a powerful command center for building with agents.

Now available on macOS.

https://t.co/HW05s2C9Nr

With the Codex app you can:

- Multitask effortlessly: Work with multiple agents in parallel and keep agent changes isolated with worktrees

- Create & use skills: package your tools + conventions into reusable capabilities

âƒ Set up automations: delegate repetitive work to Codex with scheduled workflows in the background

The Codex app is available starting today on macOS, with Windows coming soon.

For a limited time, Codex is available through ChatGPT Free and Go subscriptionsâ€”and weâ€™re doubling rate limits for Plus, Pro, Business, Enterprise, and Edu usersâ€”across the Codex app, CLI, IDE extension, and cloud. https://t.co/Q26oarCRfL

tier2_research.text: This year we will see more and more LLM-aided scientific discoveries. If you want to get up to speed on where we are today, especially in mathematics, check out this video of my talk "Recent Advances in LLMs for Mathematics" https://t.co/9jvP50zQFP https://t.co/g7HTB6hzew

tier3_industry.text:
the codex app is really good, try it out.

i've been a die-hard terminal / emacs user for many years, but since using the codex app, going back to the terminal has felt like going back in time.

feels like an agent-native interface for building.
Our Abilene Stargate data center is driving local economic value, for the city and its residents:

RT @Liv_Boeree: WHICH AI IS THE BEST GAMES PLAYER?!

Google are launching their â€œAI Game Arenaâ€ today, which pits all the major LLMs (Geminâ€¦

The AI field is in need of harder benchmarks to test capabilities of the latest AI models. This update to @Kaggle Game Arena with werewolf and poker (heads-up) plus chess, gives us new objective measures of real-world skills like planning and decision making under uncertainty.

For the next 3 days, there will be daily live commentary and analysis covering the new benchmarks - from chess & poker legends @GMHikaru, @Liv_Boeree, @NickSchulman, @DougPolkVids. Tune in at 9:30am PT starting today, should be a lot of fun: https://t.co/4i1Eyhqzfg

Our AI tools like DeepVariant and DeepPolisher are helping researchers sequence genomes for endangered species, compressing what once took years into just days. 

Genomes of 13 species are free and available for use by conservation researchers. Now @Googleorg is helping partners scale to 150+ more species, building a vital resource for global conservation and biology.
RT @xAIMemphis: xAI in consultation with the Governor and local authorities deployed 500 generators to NES in Nashville to families in needâ€¦

The fastest, most reliable Wi-Fi in the sky is now on board 300+ planes, nearâ€¦

tier7_indie.text:
You absolutely cannot trust Germans with nukes

Did we learn anything from history? I'm Dutch so I sure as hell did when we were invaded by them

French yes, British yes  they can have nukes, they're trustworthy, not Germans

They'll start behavior policing the entire EU with nuclear weapons as a threat

Absofuckinglutely not

ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡· My favorite thing about Brazil is the buffets

They're everywhere and you can get fresh made whole foods like meat and vegetables priced per kilogram

And with nice medium rare steak usually

Here's my almost 1kg/2lbs regular lunch every day

One difference with buffets rest of world where I'd never ever touch buffets there because the food is usually old and stale, in Brazil it's almost always fresh and hot

It's a bit like the Warungs in Indonesia btw

Hall of fame email subject line for demonstrating two suborgs at each others' throats:

"You have excellent approval odds for the Venmo credit card"

(Marketing really wants to say "pre-approved", Legal/Compliance says "We can't say that anymore.")

And so sometimes a transaction might need a private banker to follow up the letter with a phone call explaining "OK so you know that bank which has branches in your town? I work for that bank. HOWEVER. If you also did business in NYC you would have picked up on what department."

"Now listen to the following very carefully: The bank DOES NOT COMMIT to any particular transaction involving our client until we tell you exactly that in writing HOWEVER I personally would be very, very bad at my job if this individual were unhappy about their house purchase."

tier8_official.text:

These challenges test the skills AI models need for the real world â€“ like contextual communication, building consensus, and navigating ambiguity.

Gemini Prompt Tip: When you give Gemini a persona, it can help you get a better response.

Keep the persona simple. A clear job title works better than a complicated character.

Try including  â€œAct as a [profession]â€¦â€ at the beginning of your prompt to see how a persona changes the style of Geminiâ€™s response.
